title: 皮埃尔·布列兹遇见斯特拉文斯基
short_description: 皮埃尔·布列兹可以说为伊戈尔·斯特拉文斯基音乐作品的诠释树立了一个标杆。在这场2010年的音乐会中，他向自己的前辈兼同事斯特拉文斯基致以了双重的敬意：首先，布列兹以指挥的身份执棒了斯特拉文斯基的童话歌剧《夜莺》；随后，他又指挥乐队演奏了自己的作品《爆炸-固定》，这部作品是布列兹为了缅怀斯特拉文斯基而创作的。在音乐会中担任独奏的是长笛演奏家艾曼纽·帕胡德和女高音歌唱家芭芭拉·哈尼根。

interview.title: 皮埃尔·布列兹对话艾曼纽·帕胡德
interview.description: In September 2010, the composer and conductor Pierre Boulez made a guest appearance with the Berliner Philharmoniker to present performances of his own instrumental composition [...explosante-fixe...] and Igor Stravinsky’s poetic short opera [Le Rossignol]. Boulez made his debut with the Philharmoniker as long ago as 1961, and since then he has played a decisive role in the history of the orchestra, both as a conductor and as a composer. In this conversation, conducted in French, the artist talks to principal flute of the Philharmoniker, Emmanuel Pahud, about the programme choice that Boulez has created as a juxtaposition of contrasts, and Stravinsky’s art of orchestral instrumentation.
interview.short_description: 在这段视频中，皮埃尔·布列兹与柏林爱乐乐团的长笛演奏员艾曼纽·帕胡德聊起了伊戈尔·斯特拉文斯基的作品《夜莺》。
